Step 1: Select your image

Drag and drop the picture you want to add the border here.
A preview will be generated so you can crop the image however you want.

Step 2: Crop your image

Customize how you want your image cropped.
Make sure to get it right!

Step 3: Choose your border color

The color will be applied to the border as you edit it.
This also affects the "glow" over the border!

Finish

Step 4: Enjoy your cool new picture!
